## PlayerUIEventPayloads."PLAYER\_UI.FREEZE\_POINTER\_LOCK" property

Emitted when the player's pointer lock is frozen or unfrozen.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[PlayerUIEvent.FREEZE_POINTER_LOCK]: {
        playerUI: PlayerUI;
        freeze: boolean;
    };
```
